questions.name: ABC Corp is having an ecommerce application where first time user need to be registered. While registering themselves, they are supposed to provide a billing and shipping address. If shipping address is same as billing address, user should select a checkbox to copy the billing address data to shipping address.

options.answer: Data transform can be helpful here to copy the data
Activity can be helpful here to copy the data

questions.name: ABC corp is having a insurance case. As per logic, a mediclaim child case can be initialised from insurance case. The mediclaim case should be copying some data already part of insurance case and some policy data from a data source. How to achieve it?

options.answer: Use data propagation to copy the necessary data from the parent case
No need of data propagation configuration as data is by default copied to child case
use pyDefault or pySetFieldDefaults to copy the Policy data from a data page populated with Policy data source

questions.name: Can I iterate over a page list or page group in data transform
Can I iterate over a value list or value group in data transform

options.answer: For each Page in >> When >> Append To
For each Page in >> When >> Set
For each Page in >> When >> Append and Map to

options.answer: There is a process icon in every stage which can be used to open the flow behind this stage. Modify this flow's connector (between assignments in most cases) to add appropriate data transform
Without opening the flow of the stage , still we can add the data transform using panel

questions.name: How to set default property values for a case.
If the view is using a clipboard page and the clipboard page is not created, the view won`t be rendered.
Pega express or case designer uses pySetFieldDefaults to add/update/remove properties automatically
pyDefault data transform calls pySetFieldDefaults data transform

You are calling a data tranform named pyDefault from Abc-Sales-Work class. There is a data transform with the same name in Abc-Sales- class. calling the data transform pyDefault from Abc-Sales-Work class always calls pyDefault

options.answer: It may call the parent class data transform if superclass option is selected for the data tranaform in Abc-Sales- class
It may call the parent class data transform if superclass option is selected for the data tranaform in Abc-Sales-Work class

questions.name: You are calling a data tranform named pyDefault from Abc-Sales-Work class. There is a data transform with the same name in Abc-Sales- class. the pyDefault data transform of Abc-Sales-Work class is having superclass option selected.If the pyDefault sets .pylabel to ABC-Sales- in pyDefault of ABC-Sales- class and sets .pylabel to ABC-Sales-Work in pyDefault of ABC-Sales-Work class", which value of pylabel will prevail while executing pyDefault from ABC-Sales-Work context.
Super class data transform works even if the data transform name is not same.
The class group initializes the urgency to 10 for every case it contains. However, we want to set the urgency of one of its child case to 30. How to do it?

options.answer: Modify pyDefault data transform of class group to achieve it as per pega best practice
Modify pyDefault data transform of child case to set urgency to 30
Modify pyDefault data transform of child case to add 20 to the urgency value.
modify the pySetFieldDefaults data transform of class group

questions.name: In an event reservation application, you are configuring a Select Flights view in which in which the user enters the destination (.Destination). Later in the life cycle, you want to display the destination value as the location (.Location) value in a Hotel Reservation view. How do you configure the data transform?

options.answer: Set .Destination as the target property equal to .Location as the source property.
Apply the pySetFieldDefault data transform to set the .Location property when the user enters the .Destination property value
Set .Location as the target property equal to .Destination as the source property.
Invoke a when condition to update the .Location property value when the user enters a .Destination property value.

questions.name: The case type hierarchy in your insurance application consists of three case types: Claim (top level), Personal Injury (subcase type of Claim), and Emergency Care (subcase type of Personal Injury). In the Claim case type, a data transform sets the claim date and work urgency. To reduce maintenance, you do not want to set in each subcase the properties that were already set in the parent data transforms. However, you want to set work urgency to different values in each subcase type. What two configuration steps would you take to meet this requirement? (Choose Two)

options.answer: In the Claims data transform, for each subcase type, configure an Update Page action and set the work urgency value.
Select the Call superclass data transform option in the Claims data transform and clear the option in the Personal Injury and Emergency Care data transforms.
Select the Call superclass data transform option in each of the subcase type data transforms
In each subcase type data transform, set the work urgency to the required value.

questions.name: You have added a page list property named Dependents to a view in the Case Designer. This page list contains the property .Relationship. You want to display the list in the view and populate a field with the default value of "Not Applicable." How do you configure the pySetFieldDefaults data transform to meet this requirement?

options.answer: Set .Dependents(1).pyLabel and a comment action using the value "Not Applicable"
Set .Dependents(1).pyLabel to an empty string and a parameter named "Not Applicable"

questions.name: In which two of the following situations would you use a data transform? (Choose Two)

options.answer: Set default values when creating a case
Copy data from one page to another
Create properties after the case has been created

questions.name: What`s true about data page?

options.answer: You use a data page to retrieve data for your application, regardless of the source
Datapage cannot be an editable page
Data pages cache data on demand to a clipboard page and have a scope.
You can make the data retrieved accessible for all applications, or limited to the logged in user or specific case only.

questions.name: Whats true about data pages?

options.answer: Every data page defines a refresh strategy.
The refresh strategy defines when the data page is considered stale and needs to be reloaded.
Data pages are created and updated on demand.
Even if a data page is considered stale, the page is never reloaded until it is referenced.

questions.name: Whats true about data pages?

options.answer: The available refresh strategy options depend on the scope of the page.
Data pages can use a variety of sources to load data.
A data page provides an abstraction between the application and data layers
This means that you can use the data page in your application without knowing the data source. Your application configuration does not need to change if the source does.

questions.name: Before creating the Data page which things to figure out.

options.answer: What is the structure of the data page?
What is the scope of the data page?
How is the data page sourced?
When does the data become stale?

questions.name: Can we create a data page from data explorer by doing an Add data page?
Does data explorere shows the existed data pages.
Data page structure can be of mode page or list.

options.answer: Page is selected when only one record can be loaded
List is selected when multiple records need to be loaded
report definition can be used as a source for Page structure
Look up can be used as a source for list structure

questions.name: Whats true about Editable data page?

options.answer: Editable data page can be modified
Editable data page changes propagated to data base
Editable data page can be of Node scope
Refresh strategy can be set for Editable data page

questions.name: What are the data page scopes available?
If a customer service representative (CSR) is working on several cases for different customers and wanted to use the data pagein the context of a case. What should be the scope of data page?
If data page contains information specific to logged in operator such as worklist related information, what should be the scope of the data page.
If some data need to be accessed by all users of all application for a node, what should be the scope of this data page?
If a finance application wants to store the currency exchange info, which data page scope this data should be kept.
in multinode system , the node scope data page would be created per node?
If a data page is hitting a connect rest service to get the weather information, how to map the input and output data?

options.answer: Request Data Transform for mapping input data
Response Data Transform for mapping output data
There is no provision to provide request or response data transform
Data page can take the end point url too

questions.name: Refresh strategy can be available in Load Management tab of a Data page
whats true about refresh strategy of data pages?

options.answer: For requestor or thread pages, you can reload the data for each interaction or by evaluating a when rule.
The data page can also be marked for refresh based on an elapsed time interval calculated from the last load time.
If you combine the Do not reload when and Reload if older than options, the data page refreshes as soon as either condition is met.
Editable data page can be refreshed only using when rule

questions.name: Whats true about node level data page?

options.answer: Node data page loads in user`s context
Node data page runs in its own access group context

questions.name: If a data page is configured to reload if older than one hour, the page is marked for reload after one hour. It is not reloaded until the next request for the page occurs following the configured time.
You need to fetch exchange rates that are updated on a daily basis from a web service and make them available in your application using a data page. Which scope would you select for the data page?
You have a data page with customer data. The data page is configured to reload if it is older than one hour. Which of the following best describes when the data page will reload?

options.answer: The data page reloads on the next access one hour after it was last accessed.
The data page reloads automatically one hour after it was created.
The data page reloads automatically one hour after it was last accessed.
The data page reloads on the next access one hour after it was created.

questions.name: You have configured a data page to look up customer data in a database table. The data source changes to a REST web service. Which of the following best describes the actions you should take to make sure your application uses the right data source?

options.answer: Wait until the data page reloads on the next access one hour after it was created.
Update your application to remove any reference to the data page.
Configure a new data page for the new data source, then update your application to use the new data page.
Update the data page to change the data source information.

I should go for another OOTB Party class

options.answer: The Display and validation section allows you to define how the property should be validated in an UI control.
